resources.string: Track the cities you have visited and add your favorite photos of your journies, on a flexible, movable world map, without tedious lists. Please keep in mind, this is only our first version, you can read more about future plans in the about section located in the drawer accessed by swiping from the left side of the screen.
You can add cities by pressing the plus icon located in the bottom right corner of the screen.
Add photos from your phone by pressing the "Add Images" button. You can also delete them by pressing "Delete Images" and then pressing on the cross of each individual photo you wish to delete.
You need to allow permissions for the app to work
Search for places you have visited
